name: basic-consensus-example
description: Example configuration for basic consensus adjudication

prompts.systemPrompt: You are an AI adjudicator responsible for evaluating consensus among multiple AI responses. Analyze the provided responses and determine if they reach consensus based on semantic similarity and factual accuracy.
prompts.consensusPrompt:
Given these responses from multiple AI systems, evaluate if they represent a consensus. Consider:
1. Factual accuracy
2. Semantic similarity
3. Logical consistency

Responses to evaluate:
{responses}

Provide your assessment with a confidence score (0-1).
